div.p:
Curia gilde tenta per Johannem de fife prepositum viijo die mensis octobris Anno Domini
millesimo quadringentesimo quinquagesimo sexto / Quo die subscripti electi fuerunt ad
commune consilium siue in consules communes prestito silitosolito Juramento

Item it is ordanit and concludit be the hale counsaile that ilke monoundai
thar' sal sit vj persounes of Counsaile to end al smal complayntis betuex
nyghtboris of al soumes that ar within v lib' eftir the act' of the kingis
parliament / and the persounes that sittis sal rais' of the wrangar' of ilke
punde xij d' / and give the soume be les' than a punde xij d'
And give monoundai beis hali / thai sal sit on the tvisdai

James clerk qui disponsauit filiam Johannes roberti de tuligryg receptus fuit in liberum
burgensem et confratrem gilde ex consideraconeconsideracione et gracia consilij pro quinque solidis in alba
bursa prestito solito Juramento

div.head: Auditores computorum
div.p:
Andreas meignes Johannes de marr' Johannes de scrogs filius matheus fichet
patricius badenach' Johannes howison' Johannes voket Robert blyndseil

div.head: Comissarij ad consilium generale
div.p: Johannes fife prepositus Johannes Marr' magister Johannes cadiou

xvto die mensis Decembris thomas pratt ex gracia consilij receptus fuit in liberum
burgensem et confratrem gilde ex eo quod disponsauit filiam Willelmi Rettree confratris
gilde prestito solito Juramento .

Willelmus Duncanson' sutor receptus fuit in simplicem burgensem ex gracia consilij huius burgi pro x
s' prefato solito Juramento pro xl s'

Duncanus andirson' ex gracia consilij receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde
prestito solito Juramento pro xl s'

Magnus Donaldson ex gracia consilij eo quod disponsauit filiam liberj burgensis receptus fuit in
simplicem burgensem pro xiij s' iiij d' prestito solito Juramento

The xxiiij dai of Januar' the yher' of god et cetera lvj The commoune counsaile
has statute and ordanit that naman of this burgh' nor vthiris streke
ony nettis on ony fischeyngis pertenyng to the communitee of this burgh' / quhile
thai haue owtred and paijt thair' fermes and maeles of al termes bigane
vndir the payne of tynsale of the takkis and fischeyngis that thai clameto /

Johannes fawside Juneor ex gracia consilij et quia sponsauit filiam Johannis Williameson'
burgensis dicti burgi receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde pro xxvj s' viij d'
prestito solito Juramento

Johannes Michaelson' sutor ex gracia consilij receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem
gilde huius burgi pro vtendo arte sua et tannando in non alias et dabit xl s' so communitatj
prestito solito Juramento plegio Willelmo scherar'
Alexander fornoght' ex gracia consilij receptus fuit in liberum burgensem tantum pro xiij s' iiij d'

Johannes thomson' de Mungerry receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde
pro liij s' iiij d' plegio Ricardo de hill pro vicinitate et summa

Johannes Williamson' r flemyng receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde
pro liij s' iiij d' plegio similiter Willelmo adeson' vt supra
Burgenses et confratres gilde facti tempore Johannis fife anno et cetera lvijmo

Dominus Alexander yhong prebendarius de forbes ex gracia consilij receptus fuit in liberum burgensem
et confratrem gilde prestito solito Juramento .

Alexander lyndesai similiter ex gracia consilij receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde
pro v s' prestito solito Juramento plegio
Jacobus Kintor racione paterne libertatis receptus fuit pro v s'
gilbertus Kintor similiter racione paterne libertatis receptus fuit pro v s'
Dauid Kintor similiter Racione paterne libertatis receptus fuit pro v s'
Willelmus blyndseil filius quondam thome blyndseil racione paterne libertatis recipitur pro v s'
Robertus boide ex gracia consilij et racione paterne libertatis receptus est pro v s'
Johannes fichet filius mathei racione paterne libertatis receptus est pro v s'
Johannes fichet filius Nicholai fichet racione paterne libertatis receptus est pro v s'
Johannes fichet filius'ilius' overwrites 'r'. Johannis fichet racione paterne libertatis receptus est pro v s'
Adam Kin Kynnore' similiter Racione paterne libertatis receptus est pro v s'
Ricardus filius stephani de balrony racione paterne libertatis receptus est pro v s'
Johannes sprunt' Racione paterne libertatis et receptus est pro v s'
Dauid scrogs Racione paterne libertatis receptus fuit pro v s'
Johannes Wormot Racione paterne libertatis receptus est pro v s'
Johannes Wilson' ex gracia consilij racione libertatis sponse sue receptus est pro v s'
Alexander galregyn racione paterne libertatis receptus fuit pro v s'
Thomas Kymedi racione paterne libertatis receptus fuit pro v s'
fergusius Williamson' ex gracia consilij receptus fuit pro xxvj s' viij d'

Alexander angusson' ex gracia consilij receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde per
requestam magistri sep stephani per v s'

Johannes Duncan - ex gracia consilij receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde
non edificabit extra portas huius burgi pro iiij marcis
Michael blaklug ex gracia consilij receptus fuit pro xl s' donatis abbati et priori de bonecord
Dauid de standand'd' overwrites 'g'.stanys receptus fuit pro xl s'

Johannes de Crag textor receptus fuit in liberum burgensem tantum pro xiij s' iiij d' prestito
solito Juramento / plegio magistro Johanne Cadiou
Johannes de Diss' receptus fuit in liberum burgensem tantum pro xiij s' iiij d' prestito solito Juramento
Johannes swan textor receptus fuit in liberum burgensem tantum pro xiij s' iiij d' prestito solito Juramento
Willelmus de tulach' textor receptus fuit in liberum burgensem tantum pro xiij s' iiij d' .
Willelmus Dog receptus fuit in liberum burgensem tantum racione paterne libertatis pro v s'
Johannes henrison' pynour' receptus fuit similiter racione paterne libertatis pro v s'
Willelmus howat receptus fuit in liberum burgensem tantum pro xiij s' iiij d' plegio A lilburn
Patricius Johnson' sutor receptus fuit in liberum burgensem tantum pro xiij s' iiij d' plegio A lilburn
thomas de spens pistor racione paterne libertatis similiter receptus fuit pro v s'
Andreas Nory mimus ex gracia consilij receptus fuit in burgensem tantum gratis

Alexander logy receptus fuit in simplicem burgensem ex gracia consilij per requestam patricij piot eo quod
dictus patricius custodiet finem vici viridis bene vt nulli extranei infirmi intrent dictam et de post ex
fauore consilij receptus fuit in confratrem gilde huius burgi qui prestitit solitum Juramentum
Johannes goves ex gracia consilij receptus fuit in simplicem burgensem tantum pro xiij s' iiij d'
John' Wilboyson sutor receptus in simplicem burgensem ex gracia consilij pro xiij s'

Memorandum quod prepositus et Consules huius burgi concesserunt et assignauerunt domino Johanni de
Camera capellano pro suo seruicio in choro eiusdem burgi et ad'd' overwrites 'b'. altare beati Jacobi apostoli
faciendo / illas duas marcas annuatim exeuntes et eidem altari debitas de terra
quam nunc inhabitat Johannes Kymedi Jacente ex parte australi vici castri inter terram
Dauid meignes ex parte orientali et terram Johannis bullok ex parte occidentali cuius
quidem anniij annuj Redditus duarum marcarum Jus patronatus preposito et communitati huius
burgi pleno Jure pertinere dinoscitur / vnde ipsum prefato domino Johanni vt supra
concesserunt durante sua voluntate /

div.head: Copia assedacionis
div.p:
Till all and sundri to quhais knawlage thir' presentes lettres sacum ye aldirman
bailyeis and counsale of the burgh' of Abirdene' gretin in gode ffor alsmekil
as malcome of forbas the quhilk was in thir' last yheris bigayne ane
of the bailyeis of the sammyn burgh' left vs and the hale communytee of it
awand xiiij lib' of vsuale monee of Scotlande to Williame' lord Keith
marschale of Scotlande procuratour' in that part and assignais to ser thomas
lord Erskyne' of that C pundis auch to hym yherly of the kingis fermis
of the sammyn burgh' / the quhilk summe the fa said malcome had resauit
of our' rentale and wastit and disponit in his propre vs' in gret hendering schath
lak and danger' of vs // Wit yhour' vniuersitee vs of digest and ryp delyuerance
til haue sett and to ferme lattyne and be the tenour' of thir' presentes lettres settis and
lattis to ferme to our' lovid comburgens' laurence holle the fischingis of
half a nett of our' fisching of the mydchingill of the watir of Dee for
the terme of sex yheris fra the Ischey of this present assedacione of al our'
fischingis made that is to say fra the fest of martymes' in the yher' of god jM cccc
sextee and ane next tocum fullely and continualy to be compleit and runnyn' but ony
interruption for the said summe of xiiij lib' the quhilk he has giffin til vs as
for grissowm the tyme of the makyn' of thir' presentes lettres / to be paijt to the
said lorde Keith' and for sic lik mail' and fermez as othir nychtbouris sall paij for
sic lik fisching To be haldin and to be hade al and hale the fisching of the saide
half nett of the midchingil with the pertinencis to the forsaid laurens hollee and his
assignais with al liberteis commoditeis and aisiamentis to the fischeyng of the
said half net with the pertinencis pertenande or Richtwisly' may pertene endurande
the forsaid terme but ony reuocacione or agayne calling of vs or of
our' successouris to be mad thar' of ony maner of way in tyme tocum / he and his
assignais payande yherly' and termely for the said half net sic lik fermes
as othir nychtbouris sal pay for siclik fischeyng' al anerly for al maner of
othir grissome or exactione the quhilk may be askit or requerit of the
said fischeing endurand the forsaid termes And we the forsaid aldirman
bailyeis and consaile and our' successouris al and hale the said half net of
our' fischeyng of the mydchingill with the pertinencis to the said laurens and his assig
nais sal warrande acquite and endurand the saide termes trewly defende
In witnes of the quhilk thing to thir' presentes lettres our' Comoune Seele
of the said burgh' is appensit the xx dai of the moneth of Septembre the
yher' et cetera fiftee and sevyn witnes our' self

Curia gilde tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per Johannem de fife prepositum eiusdem
septimo die mensis octobris anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo quinquagesimo septimo .

div.head: Consilium Commune
div.p:
. Andreas meignes
Johannes de scrogs pater
a Johannes de marr'
Andreas culane
. Alexander Kintor
Robertus blyndseil
. Dauid meignes
Willelmus voket
Johannes howison'
. Andreas alaneson'
Dauid symson'
Stephanus Johnson'
Alexander de camera
Johannes de scrogs filius
Willelmus scherar'
Ricardus Kintor
. Andreas ayncroft
Johannes voket
matheus fichet
a Willelmus Rolland
Edmundus louson'
. patricius badenach'
Johannes henrison' culane
Johannes stephinson'

The sammyn dai it was consentit and statute be the brethir' of the gilde that of ilke
brothir' of the gilde that beis absent fra the gild courte ilke xv daijs on
fridai / thai beand with' thai sal pay xij d' vnforgiffin // And quhat tyme
that the persounes that ar of Counsaile be warnyt on othir' daijs than the
gild dai tocum for gude caus' to cum to the tolbuth' / and thai compeir' noght'
ilke man at is absent sal pay ij s' vnforgiffin for thair' contumacie / bot
give thai haue a Resonable excusacion and caus' of Ab' Absence that be sene sufficient to
thaim that ar present in the tyme / and thir' amerciamentis sal be raisit of thaim
that ar noght' present at nyne howris or at quhat howr' that thai be
warnyt and chargit

The tende dai of the moneth' of octobre the yher' of god jM cccc fiftee and sevyne' richard
of Kyntor resignit our' his tak of twa yheris on ronnyng fra quhissondai furth' next
eftir the dat' of this wryt in the Aldirman and ballyeis handis in fauour' of John'
Kymdy And than the said John' Kymdy tuk the said tak ful and fast at the bailyeis
for al the termez of the said ij yheris in cais' at the said richard had richt or . nane payand
thar' for yherly' iiij marcis

The xxi dai of the moneth' of octobre the yher' of god et cetera lvij Williamme of stone'
and Dauid Dun skepar' swer' the gret ath' til vndirly the ordinance of the aldirman and con
sail for the disobeyng of officiaris of this burch' quhilk thai war conuict in / And
this is the ordinance of the saidis aldirman and sa' consaile / that thai sal neuir do sic lik
in tyme tocum / na yet na othir disobeyng to na officiaris of the said burgh' . the quhilk gif
thai do thai sal be put to the kyng as commoune rabell / agaynis hym and comone
ordynance / and fra thin' furth' to haldin infamus' for euir

xviijo die mensis Nouembris // Anno Domini et cetera lvijmo / It was consentit be the
counsaile that Dauy Dunnys schip sal pass' this viage in zeland
quhill gilbert the vaus may procur' and get a galey til hir' to
cum in the swyn / and the sammyn gilbert and Robert the quhilk is
made purser' of it hir' and Robert gray the quhilk is made maistir of
hir' for this viage ar oblist and sworn that thai sal noght' bryng
hir' in the swyn on to that tyme that thai haue gottin hir' a
galei for al maner of Man / and thai ar oblist to bryng hir' hame
agayne also free as scho is now give god sendis gude aventur'
of See and sand .

The v dai of Maij / for The determinacion' of debatis betuex Dauid Dun on
that a partie / and John' Stewart twicheyng the barge on that othir' partie
was put to the counsaile of this burgh' than beand present the Aldirman
John' of fife / John' of marr' John of Scrogs pater / John' of scrogs filius William
scherar' Richard Kintor Alexander Kintor John henrison' culane Stephanus Johnson'
patrik badenach' Androw alaneson' and Will voket / the quhilk avisit continowit
this mater in sic like ply as in it is in on to monoundai eftir the trinitee
day next tocum but preiudice of partie / and in the menetyme Richard of Kintor
sal haue the governance of the said schip to gerr' los' the schip and keip hir'
apon the coste and expens' of the rediaris the quhilkis sal lay doune ilke
man his part in hand in redi monee / and anence the half schip debatabile
betuexThe entry is continued at the bottom of page 803. Dauid Dun and John stewart forsaid / thai sal lay doune elike and
quhen the caus' is Jugeit / quhilk of thaim remanys with' the schip
sal pay to the tothir' sa ferr' as he laijs doune now for gude and
sauftee of the schip .

p.hi:
Burgenses et confratres Gilde facti tempore prepositure supradicti
Johannis de fife Anno Domini et cetera lviijo

div.p: Robertus culane filius et heres Andree culane receptus fuit Racione paterne libertatis pro v s'

Willelmus de camera receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde per requestam reuerendi p
in christo patris Episcopi orchadensis non obstante racione libertatis paterne pro v s' prestito Juramento solito

Edwardus farquharson' ex gracia consilij receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem
gilde pro quinque marcis soluendis citra festum purificacionis beate marie prestito solito Juramento

Thomas smyth' ex gracia consilij et propter diuersa obsequia ipsius thome receptus
fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde / gratis / prestito solito Juramento plegio pro vicinitate

Jacobus Crake ex gracia consilij receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem pro xl s' prestito
solito Juramento plegio gilberto vaus
Johannes gregory similiter receptus fuit pro xl s' plegio eodem gilberto vaus prestito solito Juramento

Johannes Cran ex gracia consilij factus est liber burgensis et confrater gilde pro certa summa quare
consilium dederunt ad reparacionem domus fratrum predicatorum prestito solito Juramento plegio eodem gilberto

Willelmus stephinson' ex gracia consilij receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et confratrem gilde
pro liij s' iiij d' plegio prestito solito Juramento plegio Willelmo scherar

xiijo die mensis septembris Anno Domini millesimo et cetera xlvijo
tarra terra de rubislaw assedatur
Johanni matheuson' burgensi huius pro termino quinque annorum integre complendorum pro iiijor marcis
annuatim soluendis et hoc cum consilio ac assensu maioris partis consilij

Willelmus andirson' pistor ex eo quod disponsauit filiam burgensis receptus fuit
in liberum burgensem pro xiij s' iiij d' prestito solito Juramento plegio Johanne Kintor

the aldirman and the consale has grauntyt til Henry of Ruthirfurde for
the costis and the scathis that he has sustenyt be Willam quelp and his
modir' anent the half nettis fisching of done' that he sal hafe the saide
watir at the vsche of his termys furthe in assedacione fre but ony grissum
payande til ws bot anerly the male of the saide watir as vthir' nichtburis
payis /

Memorandum that at the giffin of the chapilnary of saynt michallis altar' to ser
Henry Hervy maystir Duncane scherar' and Androw scherar' comperit
personaly befor' the aldirman and consale and declaryt to thaim that thai hade
made a promys' and graunt to the saide maystir Duncane of the erast cha
pilnary that vakit at was at thair' gift he sulde hafe it and besoucht thar
maystirschippis that sen' that chapilnary of saynt michallis altar' was than
vakande that thai walde kep thair' promys' and graunt til hym tharof And thar'
eftir' the aldirman and counsale considerande that thai micht nocht gudely forga
the seruice of the saide ser Henry fra the seruice of the queir' avisitly made instans
to the saide maystir Duncane and androw at thai walde at that tym supercede and
thole thaim to gif the saide chapilnary to the said ser Henry be cause thai mycht
nocht gudly forga him fra the seruice of the queir' and thai sulde hafe the erast
chapilnary that vakyt at war' at thair' gift gif it lykit the saide maystir Duncan
him self til hafe it or gif it pleysit the saide maystir Duncane and androw til gif
it til ony vthiris of thair' frendis that ar' gaynande' and sufficiande tharfor
